document.full_text: clarence carter, a 49-year-old ohio man convicted of beating to death another prison inmate after a dispute over what tv channel to watch, was executed on tuesday morning.
document.title: ohio jailhouse killer executed
lines_and_colors: clarence carter, a 49-year-old ohio man convicted of beating to death another prison inmate after a dispute over what tv channel to watch, was executed on tuesday morning.
